name: Backyard Telescope
description: Campaign for all things backyard telescope related
query: Looking for things a backyard telescope enthusiast might enjoy reading about. Focussing in on new things but calling out workflow augmentations and new scopes.

posts.text: Successfully extracted 15 pages of content tailored for backyard telescope enthusiasts covering new advancements in telescope technology, astrophotography breakthroughs, and innovations in amateur astronomy workflow. Notable findings include the rise of smart telescopes simplifying operation, development in CCD and infrared imaging improving astronomy observations, and emerging techniques in astrophotography that mitigate light pollution. The exploration of novel tools like GoTo telescopes and remote-controlled telescope systems highlight significant advancements in visibility and usability for amateur astronomers. The activities of citizen science contribute to remarkable astronomical discoveries, and extensive resources available foster community and further exploration.

name: Blockchain Provenance
description: Anything relating to digital provenance on the blockchain
query: Looking for companies and solutions out there attempting to solve all varieties of digital provenance using a blockchain.

posts.text: Blockchain provenance solutions are revolutionizing digital asset tracking and verification. Companies are developing innovative approaches to ensure authenticity and traceability across various industries. Key developments include NFT provenance verification systems, supply chain transparency platforms, and blockchain-based authentication methods that provide immutable records of asset history and ownership.
